alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 11:11PM EDT until April 25 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1110 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of I-75 At Exit 16, or 8 miles northeast of Quitman, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Tree damage has been reported in Quitman with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Blue Springs, I-75 At Exit 22 and Kinderlou. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
